name: Asteria Vision Labs
founding_story_summary: Started in a Berlin university lab to develop edge-based vision AI for industrial apps, inspired by drone surveillance needs.
mission_statement: To empower real-time, privacy-focused vision intelligence for a connected world.
primary_products: SightFlow MX edge vision SDK; Asteria NovaCam smart cameras; DefectSpotter industrial QA module
primary_services: Custom AI model training; Cloud-to-edge deployment services; API integrations
core_ip_assets: Edge-optimized neural nets; Anomaly detection algorithms; Privacy-preserving vision patents
subsidiaries: Asteria NA Inc (San Francisco, USA); Asteria APAC Ltd (Tokyo, Japan)
major_customers: Helios Mobility Systems (EV QA); RetailOptix (logistics); AutoForge (manufacturing)
major_suppliers: ChipForge Semiconductors (sensors, Taiwan); DataEdge Cloud (hosting, USA); OptiLens (optics, acquired 2024)
go_to_market_strategy: B2B enterprise sales via demos and PoCs; Partner ecosystem with integrators; Freemium SDK for developers
pricing_model: Subscription-based: Per-device licensing + premium support tiers; Usage-based for cloud inference
primary_cloud_provider: Google Cloud (primary) with AWS for multi-region compliance
erp_system: Oracle NetSuite for ERP and finance
crm_system: HubSpot CRM with AI lead scoring
data_stack: TensorFlow ecosystem; BigQuery for analytics; Kafka for streaming data
environmental_goals: Net-zero data centers by 2030; Reduce e-waste by 20% annually via modular hardware
diversity_goals: Achieve 45% diverse hires by 2027; Inclusive AI ethics training for all employees; Annual diversity reports
esg_policy_summary: ESG framework emphasizing ethical AI, data privacy, and sustainable computing practices.
risk_register_top3: 1. Regulatory scrutiny on AI ethics (mitigated by audits); 2. Competition in edge AI; 3. IP theft risks from fake marketing scandals
competitors: VisionTitan Inc (USA); EdgeAI Corp (China); OptiSense Tech (Canada)
regulators: EU AI Act regulators; US FTC (antitrust); TÜV SÜD (certification)
cash_management_policy: Maintain 9 months liquidity; Diversified investments in AA-rated bonds; Counterparty limits at A or better
treasury_risk_limits: VaR limit $2.8M daily; FX exposure hedged within ±$0.8M; No speculative derivatives
board_committees: Audit; Ethics & AI; Compensation; Nominating; Sustainability
